    • Method Detail

      • addFormat

        public int addFormat(Format.MediaFormat mediaformat)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a mediaformat to the database.
        Parameters:
        mediaformat - The mediaformat to be added.
        Returns:
        The formatid of the format stored, or -1 if the database connection fails.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addFormatDigitalCopy

        public int addFormatDigitalCopy(java.lang.String filetype)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a digital copy mediaformat to the database.
        Parameters:
        filetype - The filetype of the digital copy.
        Returns:
        The formatid of the format stored, or -1 if the database connection fails.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addFormatDigitalCopy

        public int addFormatDigitalCopy(java.lang.String filetype,
                       int resox,
                       int resoy)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a digital copy mediaformat to the database.
        Parameters:
        filetype - The filetype of the digital copy.
        resox - The width of the file in pixels.
        resoy - The height of the file in pixels.
        Returns:
        The formatid of the format stored, or -1 if the database connection fails.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
